transportAdvice: Minneapolis has a light rail system and bus network that connects downtown, the airport, and major attractions, making public transit a practical option for tourists. Downtown and the Uptown neighborhood are walkable, and taxis as well as ride-hail vehicles are widely available throughout the city.

weather.description: Bitterly cold and snowy, January is the harshest month with frequent sub-zero temperatures and icy conditions.
Still deeply cold with regular snowfall, though daylight hours begin to noticeably increase.
Temperatures begin to climb but winter lingers with a mix of snow, sleet, and cold rain.
Spring arrives unevenly with warming days, occasional late snow, and frequent rain showers.
A pleasant and green month with mild temperatures and blooming parks, though thunderstorms are possible.
Warm and lively with long daylight hours, outdoor festivals begin and thunderstorms are common.
The warmest month of the year, humid and sunny with peak outdoor activity and occasional heavy storms.
Still warm and humid with summer festivals in full swing and afternoon thunderstorms possible.
A beautiful early autumn month with cooling temperatures, lower humidity, and colorful foliage beginning.
Crisp fall weather with stunning foliage colors, though temperatures drop quickly toward month's end.
Cold and grey with the first snowfalls of the season and rapidly shortening days.
Full winter conditions with snow, ice, and very cold temperatures; festive holiday events brighten the dark days.
